name: 8Bit Towerdefense
description:
8BIT TOWERDEFENSE

If your game crashes at wave 10 you can try the EXE for PC.

8BIT Towerdefense.zip

Controls
The entire game can be played with clicking.
Clicking an empty spot allows you to place a wall.
Clicking a Wall allows you to place a tower.
Clicking a Tower allows you to upgrade it.

After you’re done placing your walls and towers you can click the go button to start the wave.

Try and get as high as possible and submit your scores to the highscores!
